title: OCE Boards... Why?
body:
We had ONE aspect to Riot that was actually global... and now it's gone.

Riot please. Why do you like splitting up your community so much?

replies.body: They're trying to conjoin the community, not split it.

> They're trying to conjoin the community, not split it.

OCE Boards are separate from the others. How is that not splitting the community?

> > They're trying to conjoin the community, not split it.
> 
> OCE Boards are separate from the others. How is that not splitting the community?

Separate from what? You mean the Forums that are being locked up? Nobody will be posting on the Forums once they are locked up. This will be it for OCE.
don't fight it son, embrace it, i'm enjoying it so don't see why you cant :D
